text:
Joseph Safra (; 1938 – 10 December 2020) was a Syrian-Brazilian billionaire banker. He ran the Brazilian banking and investment empire, Safra Group.
He was the chairman of all Safra companies, among them Safra National Bank of New York and Banco Safra headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil. Safra had a net worth of $24.7 billion. He is Jewish.
Safra died on 10 December 2020 in São Paulo, Brazil at the age of 82.

annotations.surface_form: Safra National Bank of New York
